algorithms.compression

Class HuffmanReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • algorithms.compression.HuffmanReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class HuffmanReader
extends java.io.Reader
    The HuffmanReader class extends Reader and contain Reader(Decorator Pattern) The class can read from text that compress with Huffman writer.
    Since:
    3.5.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bar Magnezi

      • read

        public int read(char[] cbuf,
                int off,
                int len)
         throws java.io.IOException
        This method Override Reader. The method read from the text according parameters
        Specified by:
        read in class java.io.Reader
        Parameters:
        cbuf - destination buffer
        off - Offset at which to start storing the characters.
        len - The length that read.
        Returns:
        The number of character read,or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached.

        java.io.IOException
